resources.string:
behold, for this is your universe.

you can manipulate said universe by creating orbs (tap the screen) in one of four different modes (observe the button at the bottom of the screen).

additionally, you can adjust the cosmos' properties by rotating your device. good use of kosm is down to experimentation.

kosm, like most aural things, is best experienced with headphones...

tap and hold the screen at different lengths to create orbs.

when you’re ready to start colliding particles, switch modes (to either default or emitter). the rest is down to experimenting.

you can always remove orbs by double tapping them.

tapping a rhythm using four consecutive taps creates an emitter at the given location. an emitter will release new orbs at the rate of the average tap interval.

holding down the screen during the first tap increases the mass of the resulting orbs.

uncheck the “emitter” button to return to the default mode.

tap the screen at a position of choice to create a circular container.

use pinch gestures to expand or collapse the size of the circle.

rotating your device while creating particles can be either a very pleasing or unsettling experience.
long press the screen to clear ALL the orbs present in your universe. use with care.
